DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see recruitment certain cell type ( alpha 4 integrin ( CD49d ) express neutrophil ) nasal allergen challenge inhibit pretreatment FDA approve leukotriene antagonist ( montelukast ) .
DOC.brief_title: Leukotriene Antagonism Recruitment CD49d Expressing Neutrophils Atopic Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects consent , undergo skin testing , medical history questionnaire , randomize either placebo montelukast ( 10 mg ) . In one week , subject return , undergo blood draw , medical history questionnaire , nasal lavage , nasal allergen challenge ( follow lavage 6 hour ) . Subjects cross-over study drug . One week later subject undergo blood draw , medical history questionnaire , lavage , allergen challenge , repeat lavage ( 6 hour ) .
DOC.criteria: 21 65 year age , inclusive A personal history allergic rhinitis ( hayfever ) ( selfreport ) At least one positive skin test cat , dust mite mix , Timothy grass , Bermuda grass , Bluegrass , Ragweed Ability provide inform consent Willingness undergo epicutaneous skin test Willingness undergo nasal lavages nasal allergen challenge Willingness undergo 2 peripheral blood draw ( 10 cc ) Use systemic antihistamine past 5 day Use intranasal corticosteroid intranasal antihistamine currently past 2 week Use Montelukast currently past week Hypersensitivity allergy Montelukast Inability perform/undergo study procedure Pregnancy ( subject report ) breastfeeding Confirmed suspect immunodeficiency Persistent asthma , atopic dermatitis , comorbid disease except allergic rhinitis Any symptom asthma past 2 week ( shortness breath , wheeze , and/or use albuterol ) Fever ( temperature 99F ) currently past 2 week Current previous use biologic investigational agent past 6 month Current past suicidal thoughts/attempts
